column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////When I showed up I gave them my name from my reservation
column2: and was told to go have a seat at the bar
column4: they said they could seat us right now
column5: I was like bonus. Great server
column6: Maximillion.. Food was good. Fresh tuna
column8: Bacon an dates.... YUMMMMMMY. I had the sangria
column9: very refreshing and light. I wasnt too happy with the ice in the pitcher
column10: because that would water it down. I left full but not feeling bad. It was packed on a saturday night
column11: so you might want to make a reservation. I think it was awesome for 2 or 4 but any more then that i wouldnt like it.
